con:testSuite.name: AS2 TestSuite
con:testSuite.con:description: TestSuite generated for REST Service [AS2] Ensure that the AS2 Wrapper is running on your local machine before calling the web-service To configure the AS2 Wrapper and send a message to a receiver on another machine, consult the AS2 installation guide

con:testCase.name: Send AS2 Message
con:testCase.con:description: TestCase generated for REST Resource [send] located at [/cipa-as2-access-point-wrapper/rest/send]
